ComicInfo.Summary:
"All the Wars at Once" (5 pages) written by Wyatt Gwyon, penciled and inked by Romeo Tanghal, colored by Cory Adams and lettered Milt Snapinn."21 Days in Hell" (3 pages) written Jack Oleck, penciled by Danny Bulanadi, inked by Bob Smith, colored Cory Adams."False Prophet" (8 pages) written Jack Oleck, penciled and inked by Leo Duranona and colored Cory Adams.Notes:
This issue contains the Hostess Superhero Ad, Superman in "An Unbeatable Power".
